com.ca.codesv.api

Interface RuntimeServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TransactionVerificationProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConnectedServer<R>, ProtocolServer<T,R>, VirtualServer

    public interface RuntimeServer
extends TransactionVerificationProvider
    RuntimeServer specifies the capabilities of a server that allow it to be used at runtime.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resetAll()
      Clears all virtualized transactional configuration stored in memory.
      void resetAllTracking()
      Clears the tracking data for observed transactions.
      void start()
      Starts the server runtime.
      void stop()
      Stops the server runtime.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ca.codesv.api.TransactionVerificationProvider

        getVerifications

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the server runtime.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the server runtime.

      • resetAllTracking

        void resetAllTracking()
        Clears the tracking data for observed transactions.

      • resetAll

        void resetAll()
        Clears all virtualized transactional configuration stored in memory. It does so by deeply linking through subordinate objects and resetting those first, before removing any local references.

        This is useful when preparing for a new test with potentially different configuration. Typically this would be done by calling this method on the top-most server object.
